thread.title: Hear Mexico City Producer Lao’s Time Traveling Club Track “Xibalba”
thread.title_full: Hear Mexico City Producer Lao’s Time Traveling Club Track “Xibalba”

author: Rachel Hahn
title: Hear Mexico City Producer Lao’s Time Traveling Club Track “Xibalba”
text:
Via SoundCloud 
As the co-founder of the Mexico City DJ-collective NAAFI , Lao has been adding a modern touch to regional Mexican club sounds like cumbia, reggaeton, and tribal music for the last few years. “Xibalba,” the title-track of a new EP of remixes from Australian label Eco Futurism Corporation , finds Lao taking this regional interest further back in time, “ to the underworld of the Maya .” Here he adds measured, relentless drum rolls as a counterpoint to the solemn refrain that floats above “ The Ha Dance ” samples and glass-shattering, futuristic blasts. Eco Futurism’s releases are notable in their incorporation of extensive nature sounds into en vogue futuristic club beats, and “Xibalba” is no different. Lao’s expert use of cooing birds is the track’s highlight, a refreshing addition to NAAFI’s genre-defying club experimentation.
